ajax.desc: Use XHR and FETCH technologies to get a file from its URL.
examples: ajax({url: string, async: boolean, success: function, error: function, progress: function, parse: boolean})

date.desc: A simplified function to know the date, year, months, days, hours, minutes, etc.

scrolltop.desc: A very simple package which scroll to the top of the page when it's called.

cookies.desc: Add two function, to setCookie() and getCookie() in Javascript. Usefull and so simple to use !

os.desc: Know the OS (Operating System) of any user. Windows, MacOS, UNIX or Linux will be returned.

browser.desc: Detect the browser and return it (Firefox, Opera, Safari, IE, Edge, etc.).

history.desc: Move into the history with "back" and "forward", or using a number (-3, 1, etc.).

isMobile.desc: Return true if the used device is a mobile.

lang.desc: Return the language used (fr-fr) or test it.

popup.desc: Show a popup of any website which allow this.
examples: popup(url: string, title: string, height: number, width: number)

print.desc: Ask the user about print the page.

screen.desc: Get info about the screen width and height.

title.desc: Get or set the current title of the page.

url.desc: Get url parameters (?a=b) with get("a") or set the current url of the page with url().

html.desc: Fill all matched nodes with a string.

append.desc: Append html string to all matched nodes.

prepend.desc: Loop into all matched nodes and call a function for each.

each.desc: Loop into all matched nodes and call a function for each.

first.desc: return the first node or call a function with the first node.

last.desc: return the last node or call a function with the last node.

prop.desc: Set or get a property of any element.

addClass.desc: Adds class to all matching nodes.

removeClass.desc: Removes class to all matching nodes.

toggleClass.desc: Toggles class to all matching nodes.

hasClass.desc: Returns "true" if the first node has the specify class

removeAttr.desc: Removes an attribute to any element.

attr.desc: Set an attribute to any element.
